name: pnp-list-formatting-average-rating-rowclass
title: Average Rating Row Class
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to change the background color of a row based on Average Rating.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to change the background color of a row based on Average Rating. In this case, the background color of the row is changed when the Average Rating is 4 or higher.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
